sentence.value: After graduating from St. Anthony Catholic School in 1977 for his elementary education, he graduated from Gonzaga College High School in Washington, DC, and went on to earn a dual B.S. degree in physics and astronautical engineering from the United States Air Force Academy in 1984, and a M.S. degree in aerospace science from Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University.

sentence.pattern_crowdsource: After graduating from St. Anthony Catholic School in 1977 for his elementary education, he graduated from Gonzaga College High School in Washington, DC, and went on to earn a dual B.S. degree in physics and [[astronautical engineering|Aerospace_engineering]] from the United States Air Force Academy in 1984, and a M.S. degree in aerospace [[science|Science]] from Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University.
